title: the search feature
description:
Hey, the search feature frequently doesn't work for me... is everyone else having the same trouble?
~Matt Struth

replies.body:
I'm checking with Wikispaces to see what they can do.

Its happened before & they had it fixed quickly.

In the meantime, the best work-around is to download the list & search it on your own machine.

--JP

You can also use Google to search the domain http://opencaselist.wikispaces.com by going here:

http://www.google.com/advanced_search?hl=en

And copy/pasting the URL to the part where it says "domain." Works like a charm.
